thread.title: Falling Markets= Heat on 401(k) Plans

author: Ary Rosenbaum
title: Falling Markets= Heat on 401(k) Plans
text:
s </iframe> 
’ve already seen articles calling the 401(k) a 101(k). 
’s, none of us were harping or even caring about 401(k) fees. 
’s human nature. People like to complain and place blame when they lose money and they don’t complain when they make money. 
’ll hear again how bad 401(k) plans are. It’s life and this is the life we chose when we became part of the retirement plan industry.
